 25 /*global gui*/
 26 /*jslint emptyblock: true, unparam: true*/
 27 
 28 /**
 29  * An interface for rendering a visible selection for the provided cursor
 30  * @interface
 31  * @param {!(ops.OdtCursor|gui.ShadowCursor)} cursor
 32  */
 33 gui.SelectionView = function SelectionView(cursor) { "use strict"; };
 34 
 35 /**
 36  * Rerender the selection overlay
 37  * @return {undefined}
 38  */
 39 gui.SelectionView.prototype.rerender = function() { "use strict"; };
 40 
 41 /**
 42  * Show selection overlay
 43  * @return {undefined}
 44  */
 45 gui.SelectionView.prototype.show = function() { "use strict"; };
 46 /**
 47  * Hide selection overlay
 48  * @return {undefined}
 49  */
 50 gui.SelectionView.prototype.hide = function() { "use strict"; };
 51 
 52 /**
 53  * Clear all overlay from the DOM
 54  * @param {function(!Error=)} callback
 55  * @return {undefined}
 56  */
 57 gui.SelectionView.prototype.destroy = function (callback) { "use strict"; };
 58
